verses.verse: A <S%H4210>Psalm<s%> of <S%H1732>David,<s%> when he <S%H1272>fled<s%> from <S%H53>Absalom<s%> his <S%H1121>son.<s%> <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> <S%H4100>how<s%> are they <S%H7231>increased<s%> that <S%H6862>trouble<s%> me! <S%H7227>many<s%> are they that <S%H6965>rise<s%> up <S%H5921>against<s%> me.
<S%H7227>Many<s%> there be which <S%H559>say<s%> of my <S%H5315>soul,<s%> There is <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H3444>help<s%> for him in <S%H430>God.<s%> <S%H5542>Selah.<s%>
But you, O <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> are a <S%H4043>shield<s%> for me; my <S%H3519>glory,<s%> and the <S%H7311>lifter<s%> up of my <S%H7218>head.<s%>
I <S%H7121>cried<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> with my <S%H6963>voice,<s%> and he <S%H6030>heard<s%> me out of his <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H2022>hill.<s%> <S%H5542>Selah.<s%>
I <S%H7901>laid<s%> me <S%H7901>down<s%> and <S%H3462>slept;<s%> I <S%H6974>awaked;<s%> for the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H5564>sustained<s%> me.
I will not be <S%H3372>afraid<s%> of <S%H7233>ten<s%> <S%H7233>thousands<s%> of <S%H5971>people,<s%> that have <S%H7896>set<s%> themselves <S%H5921>against<s%> me <S%H5439>round<s%> about.

<S%H6965>Arise,<s%> O <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> <S%H3467>save<s%> me, O my <S%H430>God:<s%> for you have <S%H5221>smitten<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> my <S%H341>enemies<s%> on the <S%H3895>cheek<s%> bone; you have <S%H7665>broken<s%> the <S%H8127>teeth<s%> of the <S%H7563>ungodly.<s%>
<S%H3444>Salvation<s%> belongs to the <S%H3068>LORD:<s%> your <S%H1293>blessing<s%> is on your <S%H5971>people.<s%> <S%H5542>Selah.<s%>
